messages.messageBody:
"passenger" posted in English and I replied in English...just go to
the site...without gatotsuing the fish.

retry

LOVE to

> covet and harass Serizawa and Masayoshi about.

messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] If you are totally bored
messages.msgSnippet: YOUR FRIEND the dreaded babelfish tells me it is unavailable to translate  I
messages.messageBody:
YOUR FRIEND the dreaded babelfish tells me it is unavailable to
translate <<Translation Service not available at this time. Please retry
later. (c: 28)>>

I imagine you've already done this but let these folks know we'd LOVE to
hear from them on our messageboard. Hearing their thoughts would be
fantastic since they have access to the source material we can only
covet and harass Serizawa and Masayoshi about.

messages.subject: If you are totally bored
messages.msgSnippet: If you are totally bored and have nothing to do ... visit http://www.3-hajime.com/cgi-local/bbs_06.cgi a poster named passenger and I are trying to
messages.messageBody:
If you are totally bored and have nothing to do ... visit
http://www.3-hajime.com/cgi-local/bbs_06.cgi
a poster named "passenger" and I are trying to communicate :D
...I hope I represented all of us well with my really really simple
English...gosh I wish they would stop being so shy (note her command
of the English language...some of us are still trying to count in
Japanese LOL!)...I know we have Japanese visitors to shinsengumimb.com
not only because momoiro-usagi read our posts but because have lurkers
at like 2-3am...during the daytime in Japan I think.
